name: Satellex
description:
Satellex is a 2d top down space shooter!

Mine the asteroids.

Fight the pirates.

Spend your ore on upgrades.

Prepare for the boss, you have 5 minutes until he arrives...

[Gameplay Video]

Controls: (keyboard only)

Direction Arrows = Forwards, Backwards, Turn Left, Turn Right

Ctrl = Shoot

Alt = Deploy Miner

Shift = Dock with space station

Space = Drop a mine
